top_comments.comment: I loved all of these! The paper wreath in a slightly larger scale would also make a great advent calendar. Just punch a hole in the top of the round part and the flappy top part of each cone, feed some thread through the holes, fill the cone with a piece of candy and tie the thread. Then write the numbers on the closed "lids" with a marker.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Love the napkin holders! Love it all really!
Hi Christina. All these decor ideas are so beautiful and creative. Loved all yours videos. You are so talented. Bless you Dear.
I'm with you that French horn looked so good 💗,but they were all lovely ideas ,thanks xx
